article_title: Nick Searcy schools Dem who calls Tea Party and KKK ‘one in the same’ – twitchy.com
article_text:
Mike Dickinson, the Fox News-obsessed progressive Democrat who hopes to unseat House Majority Leader Eric Cantor, says he’s 100 percent on board with Rep. Alan Grayson in equating the Tea Party with the KKK.

That caught the attention of actor Nick Searcy.

Say I'm in the Klan again,guy who supported Robert Byrd, and my bitches will slap the shit out of you! @VoteMike2014 pic.twitter.com/eW7sx4zGdC — Yes, Nick $earcy! (@yesnicksearcy) February 22, 2014

If that doesn’t settle the matter (and it should), there’s always this.
